markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Swimming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2953)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=672" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This potion tastes like salt water, and sandy grit settles at the bottom of its container. When you drink it, you gain a swim Speed equal to your land Speed for 10 minutes.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Swimming
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Potion of Swimming (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 261 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The swim Speed lasts for 1 hour.
name: Potion of Swimming (Greater)
